```{r}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
```


```{r}
drv = dbDriver("SQLite")

retail_sales_db = dbConnect(drv, dbname = "./data/retail_sales.sqlite")

```

```{r}
customers = read.csv("./data/customers.csv",
                     header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)



```


```{r}
dbWriteTable(retail_sales_db,
             "CUSTOMERS", customers, overwrite = TRUE)

```


```{r}

dbListTables(retail_sales_db)
dbListFields(retail_sales_db, "CUSTOMERS")

dbGetQuery(retail_sales_db, 
           "SELECT *
           FROM CUSTOMERS
           LIMIT 10")

```
